snippet.title: 2020 [MD] Yazzie
snippet.description:
A short video game made by RetroSouls Team, based on Novosibirsk, Russia. The Genesis version of this game was released on itch.io on late March 2020; Yazzie was released previously on the ZX Spectrum and also the MSX.

You play as a gold digger, who has to collect all of the gold while avoiding nasty traps and enemies.

You can get this game for free here: https://retrosouls.itch.io/yazzie16bit
Official website: http://retrosouls.net 

BizHawk, a video game consoles emulator, is used to run this game.

Rendered to AVI using BizHawk's built in recorder, and trimmed via AviSynth. Encoded by theinstantmatrix using ffmpeg.
